article_title: North Korea Nuke News Proves Deadly Folly Of Obama's Iran Policy

article_metadata.author: Steve Forbes

og.description: THE SHOCKING NEWS, reported two days ago by the Wall Street Journal, that Chinese officials now believe North Korea has 20 nuclear warheads—far more than previously thought—and could double that number by next year, should blast away any remaining support for President Obama’s Ahab-like obsession with negotiating a nuclear weapons deal [...]
